actions.name: Ivan - Get Indicators and Store to CTIA Private
actions.title: Ivan - Get Indicators and Store to CTIA Private

properties.display_name: Ivan - Get Indicators and Store to CTIA Private

properties.description:
Get security activity from Umbrella Reporting API v1 (get token present but not used with V1 / use it if API v2)
Query by default last 30 days (Set by Static Workflow Variable)
Output a Table with distinct domain;value

properties.name: input_table_response_object

properties.script:
import json, sys
list1  = json.loads(sys.argv[1])
list_set = set(list1)
unique = []
unique_list = (list(list_set))
for x in unique_list:
    unique.append(x)
